Articles.Content: So i saw that there were some tags under your name, and one of them said Space Enginer. Do you get space enginer by posting a certin amount, and if so, how many posts?
I think 100? Maybe 50. I know 500 and above is Master Rocket Scientist, as mine suggests.
I want to know how you get to be a volunteer test subject.

I want to know how you get to be a volunteer test subject.

It\'s the beta testers. They won\'t be taking anymore.

It\'s the beta testers. They won\'t be taking anymore.

I thought it was something along those lines. Lame.
I have some 190 replies and my title is Spacecraft Engineer
